parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns if sides are friendly or hostile. For a value smaller than 0.6 it results in being enemy, otherwise it is friendly. See also [[Side relations]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> side1 '''getFriend''' side2

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> side1: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> side2: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - Decimal value between 0.0 to 1.0

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>value <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[west]] [[getFriend]] [[east]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_isEnemy <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[side]] _killer [[getFriend]] [[side]] _victim < 0.6;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setFriend]], [[BIS_fnc_sideIsFriendly]], [[BIS_fnc_sideIsEnemy]], [[Side relations]]
</value></part></template>
